content: Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 24 Mar 2019Anyone knows the cost of setting up a franchise such as 7-11, McDonalds or Singapore Pools?What is the capital required to set up a franchise in Singapore? Is it a good investment?1 answerAnswerBump0

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 25 Mar 2019Mcdonalds, you need to be a multi-millionaire to bid for the franchise. Currently the franchise owner is HanBaoBao Pte Ltd. Singapore pools, sadly, no more opening for franchise. It is just too lucrative so they want to keep it all to themselves.For 7-11 and others, you can check out seedly article:  https://blog.seedly.sg/how-real-is-your-franchising-dream-in-singapore/0 comments0
